title: Final Fantasy VII - Advent Children (HQ)(Tri Audio) [720p] BDRip
description: Encoded the movie Final Fantasy VII - Advent Children into high quality MKV h.264 format with English, Japanese, and French Audio, along with English, French and Spanish Subtitles as well. For playback all you need is the proper codec or media player if you don't already have it. Combined Community Codec Pack (which I prefer) or the K-Lite Codec pack should give you all you need and more to play these back. If you do not wish to install a codec pack, a modern Media Player such as MPC-HC or VLC Media Player should come bundled with everything you need. SCREENSHOTS https://imgur.com/a/oopJNS1
